title: Horizon Forbidden West Backpedal - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.04.21
description:
Gary Whitta and Greg talk about PlayStation reversing course on Horizon Forbidden West's upgrade plan, Tripwire Interactive's terrible weekend, and Alan Wake Remastered!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:07:45 - Housekeeping
It's SUB-TEMBER On Twitch! Viewers across the platform throughout the month can take advantage of 20% off subscriptions for first-time subscribers and gifted subs. Your support means the world to us here at Kinda Funny and right now you can take advantage of this deal and receive benefits like ad-free viewing, sub emotes, and more.
Remember, there’s a PlayStation Showcase THURSDAY at 1 pm PT, and we’ll be reacting LIVE to it on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames! PREDICTIONS are up now on PSILY youtube.com/kindafunnygames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:The Kinda Funny Destiny 2 PC Clan & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:09:25 - Horizon Forbidden West PS4/PS5 Backpedal
00:26:65 - TripWire JOURNEY
00:47:40 - Ad
00:50:45 - Alan Wake Remastered Announced, Sam Lake at Remedy
01:00:58 - New EA Studio Neon Black? Andy Robinson @ VGC
01:01:35 - Out today
01:03:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing and Andy
